text: The flag of Tbilisi, capital of Georgia, is a rectangular white banner with a blue Nordic-type cross outlined in amber that extends to edges of the flag. The point of crossing is crowned by the central detail from the seal of Tbilisi surrounded by seven-point gold stars lined up in a crescent manner.Flag of Tbilisi . Government of Tbilisi. Accessed on July 17, 2007. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Gold #CFB53B White #FFFFFF Bright Blue #0096FF ==References== Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:Georgia Tbilisi
title: Flag of Tbilisi
